actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to rename that portion of the Garrison diversion unit, Missouri River Basin project, known as the Snake Creek Pumping Plant as the "Totten Trail Pumping Plant" to memorialize the historic role of the Totten Trail during pioneer days.

summary.text: Renames that portion of the Garrison diversion unit, Missouri River Basin project, known as the Snake Creek Pumping Plant, as the "Totten Trail Pumping Plant" to memorialize the historic role of the Totten Trail during pioneer days.

titles.title: A bill to rename that portion of the Garrison diversion unit, Missouri River Basin project, known as the Snake Creek Pumping Plant as the "Totten Trail Pumping Plant" to memorialize the historic role of the Totten Trail during pioneer days.
